title: Together
description: The title “Together”: A Warli expression illustrating the tribe, their unity, and the cultural exchanges that shape their way of life.

title: We
description: The title “We”: A Warli expression illustrating the tribe, their unity, and the cultural exchanges that shape their way of life.

title: Fish with borders
description: The title “Fish with borders”: Inspired by the Minz totem. The fish swimming despite the borders around it.

title: Hunt by the Sun
description: Hunt by the Sun — radiant as the sun itself, tribal women of Jharkhand illuminate the path as they perform their ritual hunt of Jani-Shikar.

title: Tortoise with time
description: The title “Tortoise with time”: Inspired by the Kachhap totem. The different sections of colour on the shell defines the different phases of life.

title: पतड़ा नू बीड़ी - Sun in forest
description: The title “पतड़ा नूबीड़ी - Sun in forest”: the sun figures as woman, the forest as her surroundings—power luminous within its own horizon. The art portraits Jani-Shikar.
